Articles.Content:
Version: 0.1.0.0.20892

Computer Specs
OS: Windows 11 22H2
CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
GPU: Nvidia GTX 1660 6GB
RAM: 16GB

Settings such as Unbreakable Joints, No crash damage, Infinite Propellant and Infinite Electricity seem to not save or load into the UI properly after rebooting the game. For example, if you turn on No crash damage, save the settings, quit the game and open it again it'll appear disabled in the UI but will actually be enabled in-game
